inquiry.title: Product Availability
inquiry.summary: Inquiry about the availability of the latest smartphone model...
inquiry.name: John Smith
inquiry.message: I'm interested in purchasing the latest XYZ Smartphone model. Could you please let me know if it's currently in stock? Also, do you offer any promotions for first-time customers? I would appreciate any information about color options available as well.
